titleStmt.title: Llyfer gweddi gyffredin, a gwenidogaeth y sacramentau, ac eraill gynneddfau a ceremoniau yn Eglwys Loegr..
Book of Common Prayer Welsh
Bible O.T. Psalms. Welsh 1599.
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: gan Ddeputiaid Christopher Barker Printiwr i ardderchoccaf Fawrhydi y Frenhines.,

notesStmt.note: "Psalmau Dafydd o'r vn cyfieithiad a'r Beibl cyffredin" has separate t.p. and continuous register.
Titles within ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 165), headpieces, tailpieces, initials, printed marginalia.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
